IONIAN SEA.
ITALY.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED FROM F/V ALESSIO BETWEEN
CATANIA (37-30N 015-05E) AND CROTONE (39-05N 017-07E).
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP
A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.

PHONE: 390 6592 4145, 3906 5908 4409,
